name: Chroma-Throne
description:
A two player couch-competitive, 2.5D fighting game, where color is utilized for stealth, buffs, and special abilities. Using their grappling hook, among other movement abilities, combat possibilities become varied and strategic for the players who choose to dive deep into the mechanics, while the game remains accessible to those who want casual fighting fun. 2 Controllers needed (preferably xbox).

  • 2.5D COLOR COMBAT
  • DEVASTATING SPECIAL MOVES
  • DANGEROUS HAZARDS
